body:
Seems like blacklisting this dependency was not enough:
```
ERROR: /workspace/bazel_pip/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/BUILD:7:1:
	Target '//tensorflow:all_opensource_files' is not visible from
	target '//bazel_pip/tensorflow/contrib/cmake:python_module_test'.
	Check the visibility declaration of the former target
	if you think the dependency is legitimate.
ERROR: /workspace/bazel_pip/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/BUILD:20:1:
	Target '//tensorflow:all_opensource_files' is not visible from
	target '//bazel_pip/tensorflow/contrib/cmake:python_proto_test'.
	Check the visibility declaration of the former target
	if you think the dependency is legitimate.
ERROR: /workspace/bazel_pip/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/BUILD:33:1:
	Target '//tensorflow:all_opensource_files' is not visible from
	target '//bazel_pip/tensorflow/contrib/cmake:python_proto_cc_test'.
	Check the visibility declaration of the former target
	if you think the dependency is legitimate.
```
